title: # 282 - Jordan Klepper & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with comedian, writer, producer, political commentator, actor and television host Jordan Klepper. We talk about guns, Parkland students, Improv, Tim Allen, working on tv, and much more! 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

 

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..
